medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The squeezing pain started a half hour after eating yesterday and has lasted for 1 day. It was accompanied by nausea and vomiting, and radiated down to the RLQ. The pain dissipated after bowel rest but returned after trying to eat again. The patient was up all night and was unable to eat breakfast due to excruciating pain, and she vomited about 4 times total.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with DM, HTN, Alzheimer's disease.
medical_history.social_history: Denies heavy NSAID or alcohol use. Reports two days of constipation associated with the holidays.
